properties.address: St Thomas Church, Main Street, Sutton-in-Craven BD20 7JS, Keighley, North Yorkshire BD20 7JS
properties.description: Games and Grub is a bi-weekly luncheon group. Soup and bread, tea/coffee and cakes/biscuits are served and anyone is welcome. The participants choose whether to play a game like Scrabble or Dominoes or Rummikub or colour or just sit and chat with others. There is no charge but a donations basket is always out for those who wish to assist the church with overheads.
properties.title: St. Thomas Church, Sutton-in-Craven

properties.address: The Hive, Keighley, West Yorkshire BD20 0DE
properties.description: Every Friday we open between 1pm and 2.30pm for a FREE tea or coffee or a cold drink if you prefer. We also invite guests from organisations who can offer advice on various topics. So don't be lonely, don't suffer in silence, come and join us at your local friendly and caring community centre.
properties.title: The Hive Community Centre

properties.address: Bethel Baptist Church, West Yorkshire BD15 9LL

properties.title: Welcome Space

properties.address: Shipley Baptist Church, West Yorkshire BD18 3QY BD18 3QY

properties.title: Welcome Space at Shipley Baptist Church

properties.address: Baildon Methodist Church, Newton Way,, Shioley, Shipley. West Yorkshire. BD17 5NH
properties.description: We welcome people of all ages, cultures, faiths (or no faith). Free hot drink and use of wifi between 10.00 and 15.00 every weekday. Free soup and a roll available 12.00-13.30 every weekday. Free lunch for parents and children on free school meals or otherwise in need, in school holidays Community Pantry available on a "help yourself if you need food for today" basis. Lots of opportunity to make friends and join in activities.
properties.title: Wesleys Community Hub at Baildon Methodist Church
